libc for UEFI¶

Note

This feature is very experimental and may change in the future.

The UEFI support for LLVM’s libc project aims to provide a standard libc frontend to the UEFI protocols. This allows for many existing applications to be easily ported to UEFI. Navigate using the links below to learn more about this project.

  • Building libc for UEFI
    • Building LLVM libc for UEFI
      • Standard runtimes build
  • Using libc for UEFI
    • Using the UEFI C library
  • Supported Functions
    • ctype.h
    • string.h
    • strings.h
    • stdbit.h
    • stdlib.h
    • inttypes.h
    • stdio.h
    • time.h
    • assert.h
  • Testing the UEFI C library
    • Testing infrastructure
